d:
爱莎贝儿-140CM-M 粉肤 AHR021 梦乃绫野 Yumeno Ayano-东瀛小舞姬

红烛摇曳的长安酒肆，
东瀛舞姬穿着清凉的襦裙，
将彩帛踢得满堂纷飞。
碎瓷声中，她踩上胡凳正要倾倒酒壶，
却被一柄乌木算盘轻轻压住手腕。

“三两七钱。”青衫郎君指尖拨动算珠，
声如碎玉，“踢翻的胡凳，踩脏的茵毯。”

舞姬挣了挣，那算盘竟似生了根。
满堂酒客哄笑里，他忽然松手，
任她踉跄跌坐。却俯身拾起她踢飞的簪花，
用流利的东瀛话轻声道：“长安的规矩——弄乱了什么，就得亲手理好。”

窗外更鼓响起时，
人们看见那小舞女正低头擦拭满地酒渍，
鬓边端正地簪着那朵原本歪斜的海棠。

身型：140CM-M粉肤

Elsa Babe-140CM-M Pink Skin AHR021 Yumeno Ayano-Japanese Little Dancer

In a Chang'an tavern where red candles flicker,
a Japanese dancer, dressed in a revealing ruqun (a type of traditional Chinese dress),
kicks colorful silk ribbons, sending them flying everywhere.
Amidst the sound of shattering porcelain, she steps onto a stool, about to overturn the wine pot,
but her wrist is gently pressed down by an ebony abacus.

“Three taels and seven mace.” The young man in the blue robe flicked the abacus beads with his fingertips, his voice as clear as shattered jade, “The overturned stool, the trampled carpet.”

The dancer struggled, but the abacus seemed to take root.
Amidst the laughter of the patrons, he suddenly released her,
letting her stumble and fall. He then bent down to pick up the hairpin she had kicked away,
and said softly in fluent Japanese,
"The rule in Chang'an—if you mess something up, you have to fix it yourself."

As the drums sounded outside the window,
people saw the young dancer bending down to wipe away the wine stains on the floor,
the once-crooked crabapple blossom neatly tucked into her hair.

Body type: 140CM-M with Pink skin tone.
n: [Misc] Elsa Babe-140CM-M Pink Skin AHR021 Yumeno Ayano-Japanese Little Dancer 爱莎贝儿-140CM-M 粉肤 AHR021 梦乃绫野 Yumeno Ayano-东瀛小舞姬
